MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L26 and WA8  postcode areas of Liverpool and Prescot , affecting properties in Halewood Park and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  11:23 AM. Our engineers have arrived at the local area and confirmed the power cut has been caused by an electrical fault on our network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 1:30 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:22 PM on 4th December 2020.
